# iOS & iPadOS 13.7 Release Notes

**Article**

Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.

## Overview

The iOS & iPadOS 13.7 SDK provides support to develop apps for iPhone, iPad, and iPod touch devices running iOS & iPadOS 13.7. The SDK comes bundled with Xcode 11.7, available from the Mac App Store. For information on the compatibility requirements for Xcode 11.7, see [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Xcode-Release-Notes/xcode-11_7-release-notes].

### General

There are no new release notes for this software update.

## iOS & iPadOS 13

- **iOS & iPadOS 13.6 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS & iPadOS 13.5 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS & iPadOS 13.4 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS & iPadOS 13.3.1 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS & iPadOS 13.3 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS & iPadOS 13.2 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS & iPadOS 13.1 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
- **iOS 13 Release Notes**: Update your apps to use new features, and test your apps against API changes.
